current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to
		  provide payment under part A of the Medicare Program on a reasonable cost basis
		  for anesthesia services furnished by an anesthesiologist in certain rural
		  hospitals in the same manner as payments are provided for anesthesia services
		  furnished by anesthesiologist assistants and certified registered nurse
		  anesthetists in such hospitals.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Medicare Access to Rural
			 Anesthesiology Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Medicare part A
			 payment for anesthesiologist services in certain rural hospitals based on CRNA
			 pass-through rules

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
)
			 is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1814 of the Social Security Act

header.#text:
Anesthesiologist
		  Services Provided in Certain Rural Hospitals

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: in the same manner as payment is made under the exception provided in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 9320(k) of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1986

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any
				other provision of this title, coverage and payment shall be provided under
				this part for physicians’ services that are anesthesia services furnished by a
				physician who is an anesthesiologist in a rural hospital described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 6132 of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1989

text.#text:
No payment shall be made under any
				other provision of this title for physicians’ services for which payment is
				made under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 9320(k) of the Omnibus Budget
				Reconciliation Act of 1986

term.#tail: is deemed a reference to a

text.#text: any reference in such section to a

term.#tail:
is deemed a reference to such date and year as
				the Secretary shall
				specify.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall apply to services
			 furnished during cost reporting periods beginning on or after the date of the
			 enactment of
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Medicare Access to Rural Anesthesiology Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a
Medicare Access to Rural Anesthesiology Act of 2013

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1444 IS: Medicare Access to Rural Anesthesiology Act of 2013
